Follow us

Brigada is an tech outsourcing creative agency based in Pristina.

We’re Brigada, the tech brigade stationed at the chaotic intersection of design and technology. It’s a real battlefield here — half our team has been dodging more bugs and glitches than we can count!

Here are some proud clients we’ve worked with:

Harnessing technology for a brighter future

We believe technology is the answer to the world’s greatest challenges. Oh, and guess what? It also causes most of them. So, we’re basically stuck in a never-ending loop of fixing problems we created.

2024/Laravel

Streamlining Police Reports with Laravel and AI

We helped streamline police report generation using Laravel and AI for a client. By integrating AI, we improved efficiency and accuracy, while Laravel provided a secure, scalable system. Our solution reduces administrative tasks for officers, allowing them to focus on critical duties.

2024/Python

Innovative SaaS for Real Estate Foreclosures

We developed a cutting-edge SaaS platform for managing real estate foreclosures using web scraping and advanced data analytics.

2024/Branding

SPARKS Forum 2024 powered by UN

Developed the Brand Identity for SPARKS Forum, a United Nations initiative in the Balkans. This forum unites entrepreneurs and public figures to drive regional development and economic growth, aiming to establish SPARKS Forum as the top platform for Balkan progress.

Services - We help you advance your business through tech and design.

As long as those opportunities involve giving us money to re-purpose old projects — we can come up with an endless number of those.

  • Web development. We specialise in crafting beautiful, high quality marketing pages. The rest of the website will be a shell that uses lorem ipsum everywhere.
  • Creative Design. We have a team of highly skilled designers with 5+ years of experience in Adobe Illustrator and Figma, who still end up using Canva anyways.
  • Customer Relationship Management. Even though we don't quiet know what it is yet, some of our team members are Salesforce Developers.
